_comments.udp_host: UDP listen address (0.0.0.0 for all interfaces)
_comments.udp_port: UDP listen port (must match sender's udp_port)
_comments.shadow_server_port: OPC UA shadow server port. Shadow server will be accessible at opc.tcp://<udp_host>:<shadow_server_port>/shadow. Default: 4841
_comments.shadow_server_name: Name of the shadow OPC UA server

encryption.enabled: Enable/disable UDP packet encryption. Default: false
encryption.algorithm: Encryption algorithm: 'aes-128-gcm' (fast, secure), 'aes-256-gcm' (slower, more secure - RECOMMENDED), 'chacha20-poly1305' (fastest, modern). All use authenticated encryption (AEAD) with built-in integrity protection. Default: aes-256-gcm
encryption.key: Encryption key (base64 string, 32 bytes for aes-256-gcm/chacha20, 16 bytes for aes-128-gcm). Must match sender's key. Generate with: python3 -c 'import os, base64; print(base64.b64encode(os.urandom(32)).decode())'.
